Html:
Maybe I am not understanding this but the stats on Rawr don't seem to match what the stats are on my actual toon (Dakinia - Lvl 75 on Galakrond).

Rawr shows:
Health - 12055
Mana - 15270
Stamina - 575
Intellect - 744
Spirit - 300
Spell Power - 1049

Toon shows:
Health - 10126
Mana - 13962
Stamina - 578
Intellect - 700
Spirit - 288
Spell Power - 871 (Bonus Damage), 1086 (Bonus Healing)

Like I said I might be misunderstanding what Rawr is showing, but I am pretty confused.

Rawr is designed for Level 80 toons. Loading a toon with a lower level will give incorrect results. The amount of added work getting it accurate for all levels is not worth it, as Rawr is meant as an endgame tool.
